description: Ruins have what you need, but your /b/Holosphere/b/ needs an /b/upgrade/b/ to locate them. Of course, you could look for one manually, but a /b/short-range Sweeper/b/ could make that process a little easier.
While the range may be low, it will /6/hum/6/ when a ruin is located /6/in front/6/ of you, even while /b/in your pockets/b/.

For a longer range scan, a /b/Percussion Scanner/b/ might work better. A /b/Holosphere/b/ fitted with one can be /6/placed and hammered/6/ to scan nearby chunks for ruins. If it gets a hit, the /b/chunk will be highlighted/b/.
It's unlikely your sweeper will be able to /6/detect ruins while on the surface/6/. They are found quite deep, but you can narrow your search to /b/cold or mountaineous/b/ biomes.
